FuncDef: This command defines the maximum number of multicast groups that can be joined on this SAP or SDP. If the 7450 ESS or 7750 SR receives an IGMP join message that would exceed the configured number of groups, the request is ignored.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the maximum number of groups that can be joined on this SAP or SDP. Values-1 to 1000.
